    How to use the `tinyfoRest` package

    Function reference

    All functions

    calc_bd_metrics()
    calculate seasonal bd metrics
    create_species_matrix()
    Create a species matrix from a dataframe
    decimal_from_deg_min()
    Calculate decimal coordinates from degrees/minutes
    decimal_from_en()
    Get decimal coordinates from eastings and northings
    download_nbn_data()
    Download species occurrence data from NBN Atlas
    get_bsbi_data()
    Retrieves BSBI( Botanical Society of Britain and Ireland) data for a given grid reference
    get_coordinates()
    Get lat-longs
    get_dw_landcover()
    Get land cover data from the Dynamic World Land Cover dataset for a given location
    get_elevation()
    Get Elevation
    get_locations()
    Get locations
    get_nbn_buffer()
    Retrieves occurrence data from NBN Atlas within a specified buffer around given longitude and latitude
    get_osm_natural_features()
    Get Natural Features
    get_phylopic_image()
    Get PhyloPic Image
    get_s2_landcover()
    Get S2 Landcover
    get_tf_data()
    Get Tiny Forest Data
    get_tf_images()
    Save ggmap Images
    get_vegetation_indices()
    Get Vegetation Indices
    get_water_features()
    Get Natural Water Features
    initialise_tf()
    Initialize TinyForest package virtual environment
    os_grid_to_lat_lon()
    Converts Ordnance Survey grid reference to latitude and longitude
    os_lat_lon_to_grid()
    Convert Latitude and Longitude to Ordnance Survey Grid Reference
    os_ngd_api_call()
    os_ngd_api_call
    os_ngd_api_call_water()
    os_ngd_api_call
